SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ISNULL(M1.SORT_SEQ, 99999), PP.PRODUCT_TYPE, ISNULL(M2.SORT_SEQ, 99999), PP.CATEGORY, PP.PRODUCT_NAME) AS ROW_NO , ISNULL(M1.NAME, PP.PRODUCT_TYPE) AS PRODUCT_TYPE , ISNULL(M2.NAME, PP.CATEGORY) AS CATEGORY , AA.PRODUCT_ID , PP.PRODUCT_CODE , PP.PRODUCT_NAME , ISNULL(M3.NAME, PP.UNIT_TYPE) AS PRODUCT_UNIT , SUM(AA.BASE_QTY) AS BASE_QTY , SUM(AA.PURC_QTY) AS PURC_QTY , SUM(AA.PROD_QTY) AS PROD_QTY , SUM(AA.PUSE_QTY) AS PUSE_QTY , SUM(AA.SALE_QTY) AS SALE_QTY , SUM(AA.ADJS_QTY) AS ADJS_QTY , SUM(AA.BLNC_QTY) AS BLNC_QTY , MAX(ISNULL(CP.COST_PRICE, 0)) AS COST_PRICE , SUM(AA.BLNC_QTY * ISNULL(CP.COST_PRICE, 0)) AS BLNC_AMT FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_ID , SUM(DSUM_QTY) AS BASE_QTY , SUM(0) AS PURC_QTY , SUM(0) AS PROD_QTY , SUM(0) AS PUSE_QTY , SUM(0) AS SALE_QTY , SUM(0) AS ADJS_QTY , SUM(DSUM_QTY) AS BLNC_QTY FROM UBZ.INVENTORY_DAY WHERE INV_DATE < #ST_INV_DATE#
AND PRODUCT_ID = #PRODUCT_ID#
GROUP BY PRODUCT_ID UNION ALL SELECT PRODUCT_ID , SUM(0) AS BASE_QTY , SUM(PURC_QTY) AS PURC_QTY , SUM(PROD_QTY) AS PROD_QTY , SUM(PUSE_QTY) AS PUSE_QTY , SUM(SALE_QTY) AS SALE_QTY , SUM(ADJS_QTY) AS ADJS_QTY , SUM(DSUM_QTY) AS BLNC_QTY FROM UBZ.INVENTORY_DAY WHERE INV_DATE >= #ST_INV_DATE# AND INV_DATE <= #ED_INV_DATE#
AND PRODUCT_ID = #PRODUCT_ID#
GROUP BY PRODUCT_ID ) AA LEFT JOIN UCD.PRODUCTS PP ON AA.PRODUCT_ID = PP.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M1 ON PP.PRODUCT_TYPE = M1.CODE AND M1.PARENT_CODE = 'PRODUCT_TYPE' LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M2 ON PP.CATEGORY = M2.CODE AND M2.PARENT_CODE = 'CATEGORY' LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M3 ON PP.UNIT_TYPE = M3.CODE AND M3.PARENT_CODE = 'UNIT_TYPE' LEFT JOIN UCD.COST_PRICE CP ON AA.PRODUCT_ID = CP.PRODUCT_ID AND CP.CLOSING_YM = LEFT(#ED_INV_DATE#, 6) WHERE 1=1
AND PP.PRODUCT_TYPE = #PRODUCT_TYPE#
AND PP.CATEGORY = #CATEGORY#
GROUP BY ISNULL(M1.SORT_SEQ, 99999), PP.PRODUCT_TYPE, ISNULL(M2.SORT_SEQ, 99999), PP.CATEGORY, ISNULL(M1.NAME, PP.PRODUCT_TYPE), ISNULL(M2.NAME, PP.CATEGORY), AA.PRODUCT_ID, PP.PRODUCT_CODE, PP.PRODUCT_NAME, ISNULL(M3.NAME, PP.UNIT_TYPE) HAVING SUM(AA.BASE_QTY) != 0 OR SUM(AA.PURC_QTY) != 0 OR SUM(AA.PROD_QTY) != 0 OR SUM(AA.PUSE_QTY) != 0 OR SUM(AA.SALE_QTY) != 0 OR SUM(AA.ADJS_QTY) != 0 OR SUM(AA.BLNC_QTY) != 0 ORDER BY ROW_NO
